PPI::Structure::Subscript(3) User Contributed Perl Documentation PPI::Structure::Subscript(3)

NAME

PPI::Structure::Subscript - Braces that represent an array or hash subscript

SYNOPSIS

  # The end braces for all of the following are subscripts
  $foo->[...]
  $foo[...]
  $foo{...}[...]
  $foo->{...}
  $foo{...}
  $foo[]{...}

INHERITANCE

  PPI::Structure::Subscript
  isa PPI::Structure
      isa PPI::Node
          isa PPI::Element

DESCRIPTION

"PPI::Structure::Subscript" is the class used for square and curly braces that specify one element of an array or hash (or a slice/subset of an array or hash)

METHODS

"PPI::Structure::Subscript" has no methods beyond those provided by the standard PPI::Structure, PPI::Node and PPI::Element methods.

Got any ideas for methods? Submit a report to rt.cpan.org!

SUPPORT

See the support section in the main module.
